qas.question: How old was Bell when he went to Canada?
What boat did Bell travel on?
In what Canadian city did Bell first arrive?
What city did Bell arrive at by train?
How many acres was the farm the Bell's bought in Canada?

context: In 1870, at age <a0_0>23<a0_0/>, Bell, his brother's widow, Caroline (Margaret Ottaway), and his parents travelled on the <a1_0>SS Nestorian<a1_0/> to Canada. After landing at <a2_0>Quebec City<a2_0/> the Bells transferred to another steamer to Montreal and then boarded a train to <a3_0>Paris<a3_0/>, Ontario, to stay with the Reverend Thomas Henderson, a family friend. After a brief stay with the Hendersons, the Bell family purchased a farm of <a4_0>10.5<a4_0/> acres (42,000 m2) at Tutelo Heights (now called Tutela Heights), near Brantford, Ontario. The property consisted of an orchard, large farm house, stable, pigsty, hen-house, and a carriage house, which bordered the Grand River.[N 9]
